name: @dita/reader
description: A viewer application for EPUB files.

scripts.build: webpack --mode=production && npm run sass && cpx 'dist/*.{css,js,map}' viewer/ && cpx 'dist/injectables/*.{css,js,map}' viewer/injectables/
scripts.dev: webpack --mode=development && npm run sass && cpx 'dist/*.{css,js,map,woff,woff2}' viewer/ && cpx 'dist/injectables/**/*.{css,js,map}' viewer/injectables/
scripts.examples: rimraf examples/streamed/readers/viewer && cpx 'viewer/*.{html,css,js,map,woff,woff2}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer && cpx 'viewer/readium-css/*.{css,js}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer/readium-css && cpx 'viewer/fonts/*/*.{css,woff,woff2}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer/fonts && cpx 'viewer/injectables/**/*.{css,js,map}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer/injectables && cpx 'injectables/**/*.{css,js,map}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer/injectables
scripts.about: echo 'Do not update @types/parse5 to version 5 or else it will break jsdom typings!'
